item.title: Hurricane EXERCISE Forecast/Advisory Number 18
item.description:
Issued at 2100Z TUE MAY 19 2015 
ZCZC MIATCMAT2 ALL
TTAA00 KNHC DDHHMM
HURRICANE EXERCISE FORECAST/ADVISORY NUMBER   18
NWS NATIONAL HURRICANE CENTER MIAMI FL   AL892015
2100 UTC TUE MAY 19 2015
 
TROPICAL DEPRESSION CENTER LOCATED NEAR 24.1N  89.7W AT 19/2100Z
POSITION ACCURATE WITHIN  30 NM
 
ESTIMATED MINIMUM CENTRAL PRESSURE 935 MB
MAX SUSTAINED WINDS  125 KT WITH GUSTS TO  145 KT.
64 KT...  75NE  60SE  50SW  70NW.
50 KT... 100NE 100SE  75SW 100NW.
34 KT... 180NE 180SE 150SW 175NW.
WINDS AND SEAS VARY GREATLY IN EACH QUADRANT.  RADII IN NAUTICAL
MILES ARE THE LARGEST RADII EXPECTED ANYWHERE IN THAT QUADRANT.
 
REPEAT...CENTER LOCATED NEAR 24.1N 89.7W AT 19/2100Z
AT 19/1800Z CENTER WAS LOCATED NEAR 24.1N  89.7W
 
FORECAST VALID 20/0600Z 24.9N  90.6W
MAX WIND 125 KT...GUSTS  145 KT.
64 KT...  75NE  65SE  50SW  70NW.
50 KT... 100NE  75SE  75SW 100NW.
34 KT... 180NE 180SE 150SW 180NW.

MAX WIND  125 KT...GUSTS  150 KT.
64 KT...  80NE  70SE  60SW  70NW.
50 KT... 115NE 100SE  75SW 100NW.
34 KT... 180NE 180SE 150SW 180NW.

MAX WIND  120 KT...GUSTS  145 KT.
64 KT...  90NE  75SE  60SW  80NW.
50 KT... 115NE 100SE  80SW 100NW.
34 KT... 180NE 180SE 150SW 180NW.
 
FORECAST VALID 21/1800Z 30.5N  90.8W
MAX WIND  100 KT...GUSTS  135 KT.
64 KT...  50NE  45SE  40SW  50NW.
50 KT...  90NE  75SE  50SW  75NW.
34 KT... 175NE 150SE 140SW 150NW.
 
FORECAST VALID 22/1800Z 34.1N  90.3W
MAX WIND  75 KT...GUSTS 100 KT.
64 KT...  15NE  25SE  15SW  15NW.
50 KT...  50NE  70SE  40SW  50NW.
34 KT... 135NE 180SE 135SW  90NW.
 
EXTENDED OUTLOOK. NOTE...ERRORS FOR TRACK HAVE AVERAGED NEAR 250 NM
ON DAY 4 AND 325 NM ON DAY 5...AND FOR INTENSITY NEAR 20 KT EACH DAY
 
OUTLOOK VALID 23/1800Z 37.7N  89.8W
MAX WIND 45 KT...GUSTS  75 KT.
 
OUTLOOK VALID 24/1800Z 41.1N  87.0W
MAX WIND  35 KT...GUSTS  50 KT.
 
REQUEST FOR 3 HOURLY SHIP REPORTS WITHIN 300 MILES OF 23.2N  75.5W
 
NEXT ADVISORY AT 20/0300Z
 
FORECASTER STEWART
item.author: jason.fleming@seahorsecoastal.com
